parameters.query:
SELECT hc.status as current_status, s.current_module, s.name
FROM handoff_control hc
LEFT JOIN students s ON s.phone = hc.phone
WHERE hc.phone = '{{ $json.phone }}'
LIMIT 1

parameters.value: ={{ JSON.stringify({ attendance_status: 'bot', current_module: $node['Idempotência: Já é Bot?'].json.currentModule || 1, resumed_at: new Date().toISOString() }) }}

parameters.query:
SELECT s.name, s.phone, s.current_module, s.completed_modules, s.portal_token,
       c.name as course_name,
       (SELECT count(*)::int FROM modules WHERE course_int_id = s.course_id AND is_published = TRUE) as total_modules
FROM students s
LEFT JOIN courses c ON c.id = s.course_id
WHERE s.phone = '{{ $node["Extrair Evento"].json.phone }}'
LIMIT 1

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ phone: $('Montar Mensagem de Retomada').first().json.phone, label: $('Montar Mensagem de Retomada').first().json.label }) }}
